name: todo-app
description: A modern todo list app built with Laravel 12, Livewire 3, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, and Docker. Includes real-time toggling, grouped views, and a clean UI.
author: Ondřej Nevřela <ondra.nevrela@gmail.com>

scripts.test-filter: docker exec -it todo_php php artisan test --filter=
scripts.init: npm run keygen && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.init:clean: npm run artisan migrate:fresh && npm run seed
scripts.init:fresh: npm run keygen && npm run artisan migrate:fresh && npm run seed
